title: betnomi
author: betnomi
created_time: March 01, 2023, 01:34:07 PMLast edit: May 17, 2023, 12:25:30 PM by betnomi
content: This out-of-row round was made possible thanks to Minerjones's initiative, as he, out of the kindness of his soul, offered to raffle his custom cold wallet among other forum collectors. Good luck!I will announce the block number when we are full.Your forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year.Please, if you already have a custom wallet, give way to others.We may, at our discretion, ignore applies (including inactive posters, etc).How this will work:Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Can take two slots if you have ever traded with Minerjones.After I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.00 - shasan01 - willi997402 - Crytocanuk03 - Sunny04 - Crytocanuk05 - Woodie06 - sam0007 - Thiago00708 - Thiago00709 - libert1910 - YodasRedRocket11 - Steeley12 - Steeley13 - 2stout14 - GazetaBitcoin15 - PeakDK16 - Soonandwaite17 - bitcoinbass18 - hopenotlate19 - Krogoth20 - Sunny21 - Remsjack22 - shasan23 - bitbollo24 - julerz1225 - Altryist26 - BTCOVERFIATS27 - Becassine28 - NeuroticFish29 - F2b30 - ajiz13831 - Darker4532 - nara189233 - 2stout34 - Darker4535 - Dcarter36 - montreal137 - montreal138 - HedgeFx39 - AHOYBRAUSE40 - rat03gopoh41 - tweetious42 - tweetious43 - m201744 - cygan45 - bitbollo46 - crwth47 - Asuspawer0948 - Koal-8449 - crwth50 - John Abraham51 - Ratimov52 - naira53 - coupable54 - $crypto$55 - Kryptowerk56 - Kryptowerk57 - BTCOVERFIATS58 - mv198659 - Mojo60 - bestcoin_5961 - tranthidung62 - Danydee63 - CLS6364 - HeRetiK65 - Amax1666 - holydarkness67 - darxiaomi68 - owlcatz69 - owlcatz70 - Markzellers71 - Timelord206772 - Ryu_Ar173 - Dernoste74 - willi997475 - Timelord206776 - MoparMiningLLC77 - cygan78 - Mojo79 - salad daging80 - YodasRedRocket81 - CoinageMint82 - Dernoste83 - haloxon84 - haloxon85 - Markzellers86 - summonerrk87 - Asuspawer0988 - Buchi-8889 - Mbitr90 - Mbitr91 - tranthidung92 - JanEmil93 - JanEmil94 - Bullion-n-BTC95 - PMICT96 - PMICT97 - Doblezero98 - Real-Duke99 - pawel7777Please note that this item will ship in April. ðŸ¦Š

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Ah, this time the conditions changed a little and reduced my chances by 50% (actually not only mine). Even if I can only say one number, it still leaves a chance to win the draw. I will continue my attempts until the Betnomi runs out of all cold wallets. I am aware that they still have other devices in stock. Â 43 - m2017

comments.body: Thanks for the free raffle and would like have 01 and 74 for willi9974Best regards,Willi
